{"seo": [], "title": "CONSTANT OTHIENO MAYENDE", "parent": null, "cta_link": "entry::1552", "cta_text": "Back to Members", "leadership": "board-of-director", "updated_by": 2, "footer_type": "footers/main_footer", "header_type": "headers/country", "bottom_bar_nav": null, "team_member_text": "

Constant is a Partner at CMK & Co, Certified Public Accountants. He is a Certified Public Accountant of Uganda (CPA) and a Fellow of the Association of Chartered Certified Accountants (FCCA). He holds a Post Graduate Certificate in Business Research Methods from Heriot-Watt University, Edinburgh, Scotland as well as Master of Business Administration and Bachelor of Commerce degrees from Makerere University, Kampala, Uganda.


Constant has over 23 years’ experience in banking, strategy, business development, financial management, audit and quality assurance having held senior positions in a number of reputable private and public sector organizations in Uganda and Rwanda.


He is the President of the Institute of Certified Public Accountants of Uganda.


Constant is a Rotarian and currently serves as the President of Rotary Club of Ntinda.


OTHER DIRECTORSHIPS: Constant serves as a non-executive director in several organizations including VisionFund Uganda Limited and UAP Old Mutual Life Assurance Uganda Limited.

", "designation_title": "Designation", "member_text_title": "Education and Professional Background:", "team_member_image": "uganda/team/constantinos_othieno_mayende.jpg", "appointment_date_title": "Appointment Date", "member_appointment_date": null, "team_member_designation": "Board Chairman"}

{"seo": [], "title": "EDGAR ERIC OMOTO", "parent": null, "cta_link": "entry::1552", "cta_text": "Back to Members", "leadership": "board-of-director", "updated_by": 2, "footer_type": "footers/main_footer", "header_type": "headers/country", "bottom_bar_nav": null, "team_member_text": "

Edgar has over 30 years of progressive administrative and management experience in telecom and fuel distribution sectors spanning several African markets including Kenya, Ethiopia and Djibouti. He holds an MBA from Dalhousie University, Nova Scotia-Canada and a first class Bachelor of Science Degree in Engineering from the University of Nairobi.

", "designation_title": "Designation", "member_text_title": "Education and Professional Background:", "team_member_image": "uganda/team/edgar_omoto.jpg", "appointment_date_title": "Appointment Date", "member_appointment_date": null, "team_member_designation": "Director"}

{"seo": [], "title": "AGNES N. MAYANJA", "parent": null, "cta_link": "entry::1552", "cta_text": "Back to Members", "leadership": "board-of-director", "updated_by": 2, "footer_type": "footers/main_footer", "header_type": "headers/country", "bottom_bar_nav": null, "team_member_text": "

Prior to joining KCB Bank Uganda, Agnes Mayanja worked as the Chief Risk Officer for dfcu Bank Limited where she was responsible for the Bank’s risk management operations and strategies.


She is a seasoned banker with 22 years of working experience in the financial services sector, fifteen (15) of which have been at senior level as a member of the dfcu Bank Executive Committee. She started her career in dfcu Bank Limited as a Lease Administrator, rising through the ranks to serve in several top positions as Head of Risk and Compliance, Head of Development and Institutional Banking, Head of Credit to mention but a few.


Agnes Mayanja is results oriented with depth and breadth in enterprise risk management, operational excellence, and business growth.


A graduate of the Edinburgh Business School, Heriot-Watt with a Master’s in Business Administration and of Makerere University with a Bachelor of Arts Degree in Mass Communication, a major in Public Relations, Agnes Mayanja also hold Diplomas in Risk Management and Credit and has attended and successfully completed several executive education programmes and courses on leadership, with Strathmore Business School.

", "designation_title": "Designation", "member_text_title": "Education and Professional Background:", "team_member_image": "uganda/team/adgnes.jpg", "appointment_date_title": "Appointment Date", "member_appointment_date": null, "team_member_designation": "Executive Director"}

{"seo": [], "title": "ALLEN SOPHIA ASIIMWE", "parent": null, "cta_link": "entry::1552", "cta_text": "Back to Members", "leadership": "board-of-director", "updated_by": 2, "footer_type": "footers/main_footer", "header_type": "headers/country", "bottom_bar_nav": null, "team_member_text": "

Allen holds a Masters in Public Administration from the Harvard Kennedy School (Edward Mason Fellow, 2017) and a Masters in International Business Law from the University of Manchester, UK (1998).


Allen is currently the Deputy CEO and Chief of Programmes at TradeMark East Africa. Her experience in operations and technical delivery of TMEA’s entire project portfolio in infrastructure, trade environment, and business competitiveness spans 12 countries in East, Horn and Southern Africa. Allen is also passionate about Climate Change and Gender and leads collaboration with key stakeholders and development partners, including the Partner States, FCDO, USAID, the World Bank and the African Development Bank. Prior to this, Allen was a consultant for the African Export Import Bank supporting the implementation of the Intra Africa Trade Initiative across the continent, and has served as past CEO of AVID Development, a consulting firm working on key issues of trade, development, and governance in Africa.


Allen is also a co-founder of Girls For Girls, a global mentoring initiative that seeks to empower ONE million girls to lead. Girls For Girls now has a footprint in 24 countries globally, 7 in Africa with over 2,500 mentees and 1,000 mentors.

", "designation_title": "Designation", "member_text_title": "Education and Professional Background:", "team_member_image": "uganda/team/allen.jpg", "appointment_date_title": "Appointment Date", "member_appointment_date": null, "team_member_designation": "Director"}

{"seo": [], "title": "EVELYN NAMARA", "parent": null, "cta_link": "entry::1552", "cta_text": "Back to Members", "leadership": "board-of-director", "updated_by": 2, "footer_type": "footers/main_footer", "header_type": "headers/country", "bottom_bar_nav": null, "team_member_text": "

Evelyn Namara was appointed in the KCB Bank Uganda Board in October 2022. She is a technology enthusiast passionate about the financial technology space and creating ICT4D solutions that impact societies and communities. She has led multiple technology for development projects, including founding a fintech startup, Vouch, that works closely to distribute and disburse life-changing goods and services to beneficiaries. She is spirited about working on issues at the intersection of Technology and Public Policy.


She holds a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science degree from Makerere University, and a Diploma in Sustainable Business and Responsible Leadership from the Swedish Institute. She is an INSEAD Social Entrepreneurship Programme alumni.


Among her past roles, she has worked as the Project Manager and Researcher for the Alliance for Affordable Internet, a global coalition working to reduce Internet access costs in low and middle-income countries through policy and regulatory reform. She has managed the Special Interest Groups (SIGs) and Community Engagement at the Internet Society working closely with different stakeholders and project teams to deliver value to SIGs. She was the Country Director of Solar Sister in Uganda, instrumental in setting up the organizations’ earliest operations in-country, and was the Regional Manager of East Africa for Beyonic, among key roles.


Evelyn is involved in Internet Governance work and is a two-time Internet Society Ambassador to the IGFs in Brazil and Mexico, a two-time ICANN fellow, and an AfriSIG fellow. She is passionate about empowering women in ICT and has mentored and trained numerous women in technology as a trainer for AfNOG and AfCHIX.


Evelyn sits on the MTN Mobile Money Board as an Independent Non-Executive Director and serves on the Refactory Advisory Board.

", "designation_title": "Designation", "member_text_title": "Education and Professional Background:", "team_member_image": "uganda/team/evelyn.jpg", "appointment_date_title": "Appointment Date", "member_appointment_date": null, "team_member_designation": "Director"}

{"seo": [], "title": "EDGAR BYAMAH", "parent": null, "cta_link": "entry::1552", "cta_text": "Back to Members", "leadership": "board-of-director", "updated_by": 2, "footer_type": "footers/main_footer", "header_type": "headers/country", "bottom_bar_nav": null, "team_member_text": "

Prior to his appointment as Managing Director, Edgar served as Executive Director for KCB Bank Uganda .


Edgar is a seasoned banker with over 18years working experience and has served in key leadership roles such as; Head of Treasury KCB Bank Uganda, Head of Treasury and Financial Institutions at Ecobank (U) Limited , Asset and Liability Manager (Global Markets Unit ) at Stanbic Bank Uganda , Unit head -Credit Risk Management at Citibank Uganda and Audit Senior at Ernst and Young.


Edgar has received Leadership trainings from Harvard University Senior Executive Programme for Africa . He is a Fellow of the Association of Chartered, Certified Accountants (FCCA), holds an ACI Dealing Certificate (International Financial Markets dealing Certificate). He also holds a Bachelor’s degree in statistics from Makerere University.

", "designation_title": "Designation", "member_text_title": "Education and Professional Background:", "team_member_image": "uganda/team/edgar.jpg", "appointment_date_title": "Appointment Date", "member_appointment_date": null, "team_member_designation": "Managing Director"}

{"seo": [], "title": "DR. JOYCE NAMIRIMO TAMALE", "parent": null, "cta_link": "entry::1552", "cta_text": "Back to Members", "leadership": "board-of-director", "updated_by": 2, "footer_type": "footers/main_footer", "header_type": "headers/country", "bottom_bar_nav": null, "team_member_text": "

Joyce Tamale is a strategic leader, financial management Professional and a Sustainability expert, committed to changing lives of people through social enterprises that touch lives within Africa and globally. Joyce is a Certified Public Accountant and a Fellow of ACCA. She is passionate about sustainability and has wide auditing experience, with over 20 years’ experience working in the private and social sector. Joyce is currently the Founder and Chief Executive Officer (CEO) of Capital Solutions Ltd a Social enterprise which has transformed thousands of social enterprises in Africa to become sustainable.


Joyce brings a wealth of experience to the KCB Uganda board. Her wide governance experience spans 15 years where she has served in different Board roles. Currently she serves as the Chairperson of the Uganda Reinsurance (UgandaRe), Board member and Chairperson Audit Committee KCB Uganda, and Board Member/Treasurer of Humentum USA. Chairperson Emeritus of the Forum for Women in Democracy (FOWODE), former Chairperson of the Institute for Social Transformation, and founded/Chaired the 3,000 members Luzira Alliance Savings and Credit Cooperative Society (LASCCO 2008-2018). Joyce previously Chaired the ACCA Uganda Members’ Network Panel (2014-2016). Joyce also served as Chairperson Audit and Risk Committee Land and equity movement in Uganda (2011-2016).


Joyce has previously served as the Managing Director (MD) & Director Finance & Investments with the Uganda Health Marketing Group (UHMG). She has served in various capacities with EASSI, Save the Children and PwC.


Joyce holds a Doctorate of Business Administration from the Swiss School of Business Management (SSBM) Geneva Switzerland, possesses a Master’s in Business Administration from ESAMI, and a post Graduate diploma in Sustainable leadership from the Swedish Institute Management Programme Stockholm (SIMP).

", "designation_title": "Designation", "member_text_title": "Education and Professional Background:", "team_member_image": "uganda/team/dr-miranda.jpg", "appointment_date_title": "Appointment Date", "member_appointment_date": null, "team_member_designation": "Director"}

{"seo": [], "title": "BALABYEKI FRANK", "parent": null, "cta_link": null, "cta_text": "Back to Members", "leadership": "executive-management", "updated_by": 2, "footer_type": "footers/main_footer", "header_type": "headers/country", "bottom_bar_nav": null, "team_member_text": "

Education and Professional Background:

ChairmFrank Balabyeki holds a Bachelor of Science in Industrial Chemistry from Makerere University. He is currently pursuing an MBA from the Edinburg Business School. He has attended various trainings in banking and Accounting including the IDA Global Banking training in Ireland and UK. Frank is a career Accountant and Risk professional whose experience in banking and insurance spans over 13 years. Before joining KCB, he worked as the Head of Risk and Compliance in Liberty Life Assurance, Head of Risk and Compliance, Senior Internal Auditor in Equity Bank and also worked with PricewaterhouseCoopers in the Assurance division. He is a member of the Association of Chartered Certified Accountants (ACCA), UK and Certified Public Accountants of Uganda (CPAU) since 2006.an", "designation_title": "Designation", "member_text_title": "Education and Professional Background:", "team_member_image": "uganda/team/balabyeki.jpg", "appointment_date_title": "Appointment Date", "member_appointment_date": null, "team_member_designation": "Head of Risk"}

{"seo": [], "title": "BRUNO MUHINDI", "parent": null, "cta_link": null, "cta_text": "Back to Members", "leadership": "executive-management", "updated_by": 2, "footer_type": "footers/main_footer", "header_type": "headers/country", "bottom_bar_nav": null, "team_member_text": "

Education and Professional Background:

He holds a Bachelor of Business Administration and Management degree from Uganda Martyrs University majoring in finance and accounting. He has over 13 years’ experience in the Banking industry gained during his work tenor at DFCU Bank Uganda Limited and NC Bank Uganda Limited. Bruno joined KCB Bank Uganda in June 2017 as Head of Finance. He is a member of the Institute of Certified Public Accountants of Uganda (ICPAU) and the Association of Chartered Certified Accountants (ACCA) and also serves as the Chairperson of the Board of Trustees of the KCB Bank Uganda Staff Provident Fund and a member of the CFO Executive Committee of the Uganda Bankers’ Association.", "designation_title": "Designation", "member_text_title": "Education and Professional Background:", "team_member_image": "uganda/team/bruno.jpg", "appointment_date_title": "Appointment Date", "member_appointment_date": null, "team_member_designation": "Head of Finance"}

{"seo": [], "title": "DIANA KOMUKAMA SSEMPEBWA", "parent": null, "cta_link": null, "cta_text": "Back to Members", "leadership": "executive-management", "updated_by": 2, "footer_type": "footers/main_footer", "header_type": "headers/country", "bottom_bar_nav": null, "team_member_text": "

Education and Professional Background:

Diana holds a Postgraduate Diploma from the Chartered Institute of Marketing, UK (CIM), a Post Graduate Diploma in Human Resource Management from Uganda Management Institute and Bachelor of Science Degree in Environmental Science. With over 10 years of experience in the banking sector, of which 7 years have been in Marketing and Communications. She joined KCB Bank Uganda in 2018 as the Manager Marketing in charge of Corporate and Business, and currently leads the Marketing and Communications Department. She is also a seasoned marketer with experience in Business marketing, Public Relations, Strategic Communications, Events and CSR Management. Diana is a member of the Chartered institute of Marketing (MCIM) and the Uganda Marketers’ Society.", "designation_title": "Designation", "member_text_title": "Education and Professional Background:", "team_member_image": "uganda/team/diana.jpg", "appointment_date_title": "Appointment Date", "member_appointment_date": null, "team_member_designation": "Marketing and Communications Manager"}

{"seo": [], "title": "JUDY WAMBAIRE", "parent": null, "cta_link": null, "cta_text": "Back to Members", "leadership": "executive-management", "updated_by": 2, "footer_type": "footers/main_footer", "header_type": "headers/country", "bottom_bar_nav": null, "team_member_text": "

Education and Professional Background:

Judy Wambaire is an Advocate of the High Court of Uganda, and a member of both the Ugandan and the East African Law Societies. She holds over 10 years of experience in Banking and Private Practice where she has gathered significant experience as an In-House Counsel. Currently, she’s the Company Secretary, Head of Legal & Compliance at KCB Bank Uganda Limited, where she’s tasked to provide overall departmental leadership including; providing general counsel, advisory support, and operational execution of the corporate governance policies and procedures of the Bank; facilitating contract negotiation, oversees litigation management, corporate conveyancing; regulatory compliance and enforcement; facilitating legal/statute awareness training as well as providing Company Secretarial services and legal advisory services to the Board. Prior to her current role, she was the Head Legal and Company Secretary, United Bank for Africa (Uganda) Limited. In this role, she’s credited for spearheading significant contributions to the legal and corporate governance standards of the Bank. She also instituted raft measures that enhanced operational efficiency of the Legal department. Judy is currently an MBA student at the University of East London; holds a Certificate in the Law of Mergers and Acquisitions from the London School of Economics and Political Science; a Post Graduate Diploma in Legal Practice from the Law Development Centre, Kampala, Uganda and a Bachelor of Laws LL. B (Hons) from Makerere University.", "designation_title": "Designation", "member_text_title": "Education and Professional Background:", "team_member_image": "uganda/team/judy.jpg", "appointment_date_title": "Appointment Date", "member_appointment_date": null, "team_member_designation": "Company Secretary, Head of Legal"}

{"seo": [], "title": "PATIENCE A. V. ARINAITWE", "parent": null, "cta_link": null, "cta_text": "Back to Members", "leadership": "executive-management", "updated_by": 2, "footer_type": "footers/main_footer", "header_type": "headers/country", "bottom_bar_nav": null, "team_member_text": "

Education and Professional Background:

Patience is an accomplished Human Resource professional with over 10 years’ experience in human resource management. She has previously worked with ICEA LION Group, an insurance company, Faulu Uganda, a microfinance company (now known as Opportunity Bank Uganda) and Uganda Securities Exchange before joining KCB Uganda as the Head of Human Resources. She holds a Post Graduate Diploma in Human Resource Management from Uganda Management Institute (UMI) and a bachelor’s degree in Social Sciences from Makerere University Kampala (MUK). She is an Associate Member of the Chartered Institute of Personnel and Development (CIPD), UK, and holds a Diploma in the Female Future Leadership program by the Norwegian Embassy in partnership with the Federation of Uganda Employers. Patience is a certified Engagement and Productivity coach having obtained a diploma from CDI-Africa. She is very passionate about adding value to people and people growth especially through coaching and mentoring, she is a wellness and fitness enthusiast. Patience is a member of the Human Resources Managers Association of Uganda (HRMAU), Member of the Chartered Institute of Personnel and Development, and a member of Girls for Girls, a non-profit organization whose major goal is to empower girls to lead in all their spheres of life.", "designation_title": "Designation", "member_text_title": "Education and Professional Background:", "team_member_image": "uganda/team/patience.jpg", "appointment_date_title": "Appointment Date", "member_appointment_date": null, "team_member_designation": "Head of Human Resources"}

{"seo": [], "title": "INNOCENT KAKANDE BITOOGO", "parent": null, "cta_link": null, "cta_text": "Back to Members", "leadership": "executive-management", "updated_by": 2, "footer_type": "footers/main_footer", "header_type": "headers/country", "bottom_bar_nav": null, "team_member_text": "

Education and Professional Background:/h3> Innocent is a professional Accountant, member of the Institute of Certified Public Accountants of Uganda (ICPAU), Fellow of the Association of Chartered Certified Accountants (ACCA) and Member of the Institute of Internal Auditors (IIA). He holds a Master’s degree in Management Studies from Uganda Management Institute (UMI) and a Post Graduate degree in Project Planning and Management from the same institution. Innocent brings to KCB a wealth of Audit experience to this position spanning over twenty years of Audit, 15 of which are in Middle and Senior Management in the Banking sector (Housing Finance Bank, Top Finance Bank, and BRAC Uganda Bank). The other 6 years of his working experience were in External Audit services and Consultancy (Statutory and Investigative Audits, Taxation, as well as Accounting System Reviews and Quality Assurance).", "designation_title": "Designation", "member_text_title": "Education and Professional Background:", "team_member_image": "uganda/team/innocent_kakande.jpg", "appointment_date_title": "Appointment Date", "member_appointment_date": null, "team_member_designation": "Head of Internal Audit"}
